Title: RNA sequencing analysis of CopY-deficient Streptococcus agalactiae during Cu stress
Description: Total RNA was isolated from mid-log phase Streptococcus agalactiae cells deficient in CopY (∆copY strain GU2857), grown in Todd-Hewitt broth (THB) medium supplemented with 0.5 mM Cu and sequenced using Illumina NextSeq500.
